answer:
Yes. The trashed cards were still accessed, even though they are no longer in the server.

Can Mwanza City Grid count as one of the additional cards I need to access from R&D because of its ability?
question: ####[ANCUR](https://twitter.com/anr_ruleswiki) [UFAQ 23](http://ancur.wikia.com/wiki/Whispers_in_Nalubaale_UFAQ) [Michael Boggs] If the Runner trashes any of the accessed cards, does the Corp still gain 2 for each of the trashed cards?
